body: Using pure scripting, and no groovy code, Using Exile Target and Leave Return Exile doesn't return the exiled card - functioning cards currently use groovy.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Exile Target doesn't seem to work with Leave Return Exile
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on December 02, 2013 01:22:38_

Using pure scripting, and no groovy code, Using Exile Target and Leave Return Exile doesn't return the exiled card - functioning cards currently use groovy.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=428_
